trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner)" /> methods and any overridden versions of <see langword="OnPaint" /> in classes that derive from them, when they are drawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para os métodos <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ConnectionPoint.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs,System.Boolean)" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.Connector.OnPaint(System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.DesignerGlyph.OnPaint(System.Drawing.Graphics,System.Boolean,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme,System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner)" /> e quaisquer versões substituídas de <see langword="OnPaint" /> nas classes que derivam delas, quando são desenhadas em uma superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: `OnPaint` method calls occur when an activity designer, glyph, or connector is redrawn on a workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: `OnPaint` chamadas de método ocorrem quando um designer de atividade, o glifo ou o conector é redesenhado em uma superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs> specifies the graphics to use to draw the object and the clipping rectangle in which to draw it.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs> Especifica os elementos gráficos para usar para desenhar o objeto e o retângulo de recorte no qual desenhar a ele.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the item.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar o item.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that represents the rectangle in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que representa o retângulo no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The view port in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: A porta de exibição na qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the object to draw.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associado ao objeto a ser desenhado.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> class with the specified graphics, clipping rectangle, viewport and designer theme.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs" /> com os gráficos, o retângulo de recorte, o visor e o tema do designer especificados.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> associated with the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> associado à superfície de design do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> that contains theme information for the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme" /> que contém informações de tema do fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> is used to describe workflow look and feel properties, such as colors, styles and backgrounds.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> é usado para descrever as propriedades de aparência do fluxo de trabalho, como planos de fundo, estilos e cores.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> in which to draw.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> no qual desenhar.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> that describes the area to draw.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Rectangle" /> que descreve a área para desenhar.

trans-unit.source: The area described by the clipping rectangle is the area on the screen that will be redrawn using the <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> supplied by <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.
trans-unit.target: O descrito pelo retângulo de recorte é a área na tela que irá redesenhada usando o <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> fornecido pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerPaintEventArgs>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associated with the designer.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> associado ao designer.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> that describes the designer look and feel.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme" /> que descreve a aparência designer.

trans-unit.source: If a designer has an <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associated with it, the designer will use the look and feel properties described by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> to paint itself.
trans-unit.target: Se tiver um designer de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> associados a ele, o designer usará as propriedades de aparência descritas pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> para pintar em si.

trans-unit.source: If no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> is associated with the designer, the designer will use the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> to repaint its look and feel properties.
trans-unit.target: Se nenhum <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesignerTheme> está associado com o designer, o designer usará o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.AmbientTheme> para redesenhar suas propriedades de aparência.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar o item na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> used to draw the item on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Drawing.Graphics" /> usado para desenhar o item na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> provides methods for drawing objects on the workflow design surface.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Drawing.Graphics> fornece métodos para desenhar objetos na superfície de design de fluxo de trabalho.
